original: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so //

translated: From then on, he will become the lord of the entire triple world.🔽In an instant, he will be able to issue commands and rule over the entire triple world.🔽Having returned, he will mete out punishments and rewards, and will enjoy the divine pleasures of the triple world.

analyzed: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so //

analyzed: de nas mthar ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyis mtshan gcig thog thag bzlas par bya'o //
translated: Then, in the end, one should recite it all night with that very absorption.

original: de nas nam langs pa dang mngon par shes pa lngar gyur nas sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa dang / tshar gcad pa nus par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas nam langs pa dang mngon par shes pa lngar gyur nas sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa dang / tshar gcad pa nus par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, at dawn, one will attain the five superknowledges and be able to benefit and subdue all sentient beings.

original: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so //
translated: Thus has the Blessed One, the Vajra Holder, declared.

original: ci ste las bsgrub par 'dod na de bzhin du zlo ba gcig tu bsgrub la de nas mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: ci ste las bsgrub par 'dod na de bzhin du zlo ba gcig tu bsgrub la de nas mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o //
translated: If one wishes to accomplish an activity, one should practice in the same way for one month, and then at the end one should recite all night.

original: de nas las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then all activities will be accomplished.

original: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so //🔽de nas las rnams byed par 'dod na yang lan gcig brjod de yid kyi @301a *//
analyzed: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so // de nas las rnams byed par 'dod na yang lan gcig brjod de yid kyi @301a *//
translated: Thus has it been said by the Blessed One, Vajradhara.

original: bsam pas bsrung ba la sogs pa las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsam pas bsrung ba la sogs pa las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, if one wishes to perform activities, one should recite [the mantra] once, and all activities such as protection and so forth will be accomplished by the power of the mind.

original: rdo rje'i rigs kyi yo byad dang / cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so ////
analyzed: rdo rje'i rigs kyi yo byad dang / cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so ////
translated: The extensive ritual procedure of the Vajra family is complete.

original: de nas padma'i rigs kyi yo byad dang / chog rgyas pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de nas padma'i rigs kyi yo byad dang / chog rgyas pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: Now, the extensive ritual procedure of the Lotus family is as follows.

original: de la dang por 'bum bzlas pa byas na bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la dang por 'bum bzlas pa byas na bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro //
translated: First, having performed one hundred thousand recitations, one becomes an adept.

original: de nas bsgrub par bya ste ras la bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba la sogs pa bris pa de'i phyogs thams cad du dkyil 'khor bzhi'i tshul du sems dpa' chen po bzhi bris la grva rnams su lha mo rnams bri'o //
analyzed: de nas bsgrub par bya ste ras la bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba la sogs pa bris pa de'i phyogs thams cad du dkyil 'khor bzhi'i tshul du sems dpa' chen po bzhi bris la grva rnams su lha mo rnams bri'o //
translated: Then, having accomplished it, one should draw on cloth the Blessed One, Subduer of All Beings, and so forth, and on all sides of that, in the manner of the four maṇḍalas, one should draw the four great beings, and in the corners one should draw the goddesses.

original: de nas bzlas pa'i cho ga de bzhin du rgyas par byas la zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas bzlas pa'i cho ga de bzhin du rgyas par byas la zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o //
translated: Then, having performed the extensive rite of recitation as before, one should recite throughout the night until the end of the month.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba thams cad 'dul bar byon te /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba thams cad 'dul bar byon te /
translated: Then the Blessed One, Subduer of All Beings, will come.

original: dus ji bzhin par dam pa'i skabs 'byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dus ji bzhin par dam pa'i skabs 'byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will grant an auspicious opportunity just as is fitting.

original: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so //
translated: Thus has declared the Blessed One, Vajradhara.

original: ci ste phyag rgya bsgrub par 'dod na'ang des de bzhin du padma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la stong phrag brgyad tshang bar brjod pa'i bar du dus bzhir bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: ci ste phyag rgya bsgrub par 'dod na'ang des de bzhin du padma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la stong phrag brgyad tshang bar brjod pa'i bar du dus bzhir bzlas par bya'o //
translated: “If one wishes to accomplish the seal, then, having formed the seal of Padma­vajra, one should recite for eight thousand times, throughout the four periods of the day, until one has completed the recitation.

original: de nas mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu phyag rgya bcings te /
analyzed: de nas mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu phyag rgya bcings te /
translated: Then, finally, one should perform the recitation with the seal bound throughout the night.

original: bzlas pa byas la nam langs pa dang dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bzlas pa byas la nam langs pa dang dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
translated: When dawn breaks, one will attain power.

original: de nas phyag rgya bcings pas ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba thams cad 'dul bar byed do //
analyzed: de nas phyag rgya bcings pas ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba thams cad 'dul bar byed do //
translated: Then, by binding the seal, one will be able to subdue all beings just as one wishes.

original: zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so //
translated: Thus has spoken the Blessed One, the Lord Avalokiteśvara.

original: ci ste ting nge 'dzin @301b gyi tshul du bsgrub bar 'dod na yang de bzhin du zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu ji ltar dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bzlas pa bya'o //
analyzed: ci ste ting nge 'dzin @301b gyi tshul du bsgrub bar 'dod na yang de bzhin du zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu ji ltar dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bzlas pa bya'o //
translated: “If one wishes to accomplish the method of meditative concentration, one should perform the recitation with the meditative concentration of one’s choice throughout the night, until the end of the night, in the same way.

original: de nas nam langs pa dang ting nge 'dzin thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas nam langs pa dang ting nge 'dzin thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, when dawn breaks, all meditative concentrations will become manifest.

original: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so //
translated: Thus has spoken the Blessed One, Vajradharma.

original: ci ste las bsgrub par 'dod na'ang de bzhin du bzlas la zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: ci ste las bsgrub par 'dod na'ang de bzhin du bzlas la zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o //
translated: “If one wishes to accomplish an activity, one should perform the recitation in the same way, and recite throughout the night, until the end of the night.

original: de nas las thams cad nus par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas las thams cad nus par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then one will be able to perform all activities.

original: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so //
translated: Thus has it been taught by the Blessed One, Vajradhara.

original: padma'i rigs kyi yo byad dang / cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so ////
analyzed: padma'i rigs kyi yo byad dang / cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so ////
translated: The extensive ritual of the articles of the Lotus family is completed.

original: de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi nye bar spyod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi nye bar spyod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: Now, the extensive ritual of the articles of the Jewel family is as follows:

original: de la dang po kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag rnam bzhi byas la 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: de la dang po kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag rnam bzhi byas la 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
translated: First of all, one should perform the four kinds of homage to all the Tathāgatas and recite [the mantra] one hundred thousand times.

original: de nas de bzhin du ras la bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi'i tshul du bris la /
analyzed: de nas de bzhin du ras la bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi'i tshul du bris la /
translated: Then, in the same way, one should paint the Blessed One, Sarvārthasiddha, on cloth, in the manner of the four maṇḍalas.

original: de nas de bzhin du mchod pa byas te /
analyzed: de nas de bzhin du mchod pa byas te /
translated: Then, having made offerings in the same way,

original: de bzhin du bsgrub la zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du bsgrub la zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o //
translated: one should accomplish [the painting] in the same way, and recite [the mantra] continuously for one night until the end of the lunar month.

original: de nas nam langs pa dang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i rin po che byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po byon nas dbang bskur ba sbyin pa mdzad do //
analyzed: de nas nam langs pa dang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i rin po che byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po byon nas dbang bskur ba sbyin pa mdzad do //
translated: Then, at dawn, the Blessed One, the Bodhisattva Ākāśagarbha, the consecrator of all the Tathāgatas, came and conferred consecration.

original: dbang bskur ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams @302a *//🔽der rig 'dzin gyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams @302a *// der rig 'dzin gyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By that consecration, he became a master of the wheel in the great trichiliocosm.

original: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so //
translated: Thus declared the Blessed One, Vajradhara.

original: ci ste phyag rgya bsgrub par 'dod na yang de bzhin du chos kyi rdo rje ma'i tshul rdo rje rin po che'i myu gu'i phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin du bsgrub na bsam pa thams cad kyi las byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ci ste phyag rgya bsgrub par 'dod na yang de bzhin du chos kyi rdo rje ma'i tshul rdo rje rin po che'i myu gu'i phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin du bsgrub na bsam pa thams cad kyi las byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: “If one wishes to accomplish the seal, then, in the same way, one should accomplish the Dharma-vajra-lady in the manner of the vajra-jewel-sprout seal, and she will perform the function of all wishes.

original: zhas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so //
analyzed: zhas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so //
translated: Thus declared the Blessed One, Vajradhara.

original: ci ste nor bu ye shes bsgrub par 'dod na 'ang de bzhin du rin po che 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin rim pa bzhin tu bsgom par byas te /
analyzed: ci ste nor bu ye shes bsgrub par 'dod na 'ang de bzhin du rin po che 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin rim pa bzhin tu bsgom par byas te /
translated: If one wishes to accomplish the jewel of pristine awareness, one should cultivate the meditative absorption called the source of jewels in the same way.

original: dngos po med pa'i nam mkha' las rin po che ji ltar 'byung ba rin po che las byang chub sems dpa'i sku ji ltar 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di dus bzhir bsgoms la ji ltar gong du smos pa bzhin du bzlas pa bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i nam mkha' las rin po che ji ltar 'byung ba rin po che las byang chub sems dpa'i sku ji ltar 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di dus bzhir bsgoms la ji ltar gong du smos pa bzhin du bzlas pa bya'o //
translated: One should cultivate this meditative absorption called the source of jewels from the space of non-entity, and the source of the body of the bodhisattva from the jewel, in the four times. One should perform the recitation as described above.

original: de nas zla ba'i mthar ting 'dzin de nyid kyis mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas pa bya'o //
analyzed: de nas zla ba'i mthar ting 'dzin de nyid kyis mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas pa bya'o //
translated: Then, at the end of the month, one should perform the recitation all night long with that very meditative absorption.

original: de nas nam langs pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byon nas ci dga' ba bzhin du dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas nam langs pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byon nas ci dga' ba bzhin du dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, at dawn, all the tathāgatas will arrive and confer the consecration as one wishes.

original: zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so //
translated: Thus has declared the Blessed One, Ākāśagarbha.

original: de nas las sgrub pa bshad de /
analyzed: de nas las sgrub pa bshad de /
translated: Then, the accomplishment of activity is explained.

original: de bzhin du bzlas la zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du bzlas la zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o //
translated: Likewise, one should recite [the mantra] until the end of the month, reciting continuously for one night.

original: de nas nam langs pa dang bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas nam langs pa dang bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, when dawn breaks, all aims will be accomplished by the Blessed One Ākāśagarbha.

original: @302b de nas las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: @302b de nas las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then one will be able to perform all activities.

original: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so //
translated: Thus has declared the Blessed One, Vajradhara.

original: nor bu'i rigs kyi nye bar spyod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so ////
analyzed: nor bu'i rigs kyi nye bar spyod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so ////
translated: The extensive ritual practice of the jewel family is completed.

original: de nas rigs thams cad kyi thun mong du bsgrub pa'i yo byad dang / cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de nas rigs thams cad kyi thun mong du bsgrub pa'i yo byad dang / cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: Now, the extensive ritual articles and practice common to all families is as follows.

original: de la dang por snying po thams cad kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa bshad do //
analyzed: de la dang por snying po thams cad kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa bshad do //
translated: Therein, first, the extensive ritual articles and practice of all essence mantras are explained.

original: snying po bsgrub par 'dod na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi grub par gyur cig ces brjod la snying po ci dga' bar bzlas shing bsgrub pa'i cho ga bya'o //
analyzed: snying po bsgrub par 'dod na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi grub par gyur cig ces brjod la snying po ci dga' bar bzlas shing bsgrub pa'i cho ga bya'o //
translated: If one wishes to accomplish the essence mantra, one should recite the essence mantra as much as one likes, saying, “May the accomplishment of all tathāgatas come to be,” and perform the practice ritual.

original: de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i yo byad dang / cho ga ste /🔽phyag rgya thams cad bdag la dga' bar gyur cig ces smras la dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
analyzed: de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i yo byad dang / cho ga ste / phyag rgya thams cad bdag la dga' bar gyur cig ces smras la dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
translated: This is the ritual of the articles for the seal.🔽Having formed the pledge seal, one should say, May all seals be pleased with me!

original: ci dga' bar ci nus kyis bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: ci dga' bar ci nus kyis bzlas par bya'o //
translated: One should recite the mantra as much as one likes and as much as one can.

original: de nas ci lta ba bzhin du dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas ci lta ba bzhin du dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, as it is, there will be power.

original: de la 'di ni sngags thams cad kyi yo byad dang / cho ga rgyas pa ste /
analyzed: de la 'di ni sngags thams cad kyi yo byad dang / cho ga rgyas pa ste /
translated: This is the extensive ritual of the articles for all mantras.

original: spros pa med pa'i tshig grub par gyur cig /
analyzed: spros pa med pa'i tshig grub par gyur cig /
translated: May the words be accomplished without elaboration!

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin bdag la skye bar gyur cig ces smras la sngags ci dga' bar bzlas pa byas te 'di ni dngos grub bo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin bdag la skye bar gyur cig ces smras la sngags ci dga' bar bzlas pa byas te 'di ni dngos grub bo //
translated: Having said, May the meditative stabilization of all the Ones-Gone-Thus arise in me! one should do the mantra recitation as much as one likes. This is power.

original: de la 'di ni rig pa'i yo byad dang / cho ga rgyas pa ste /
analyzed: de la 'di ni rig pa'i yo byad dang / cho ga rgyas pa ste /
translated: This is the extensive ritual of the articles for knowledge.

original: kye ma sems can 'di dag thams cad ni mi rag pas ldongs par gyur /
analyzed: kye ma sems can 'di dag thams cad ni mi rag pas ldongs par gyur /
translated: Alas! All these sentient beings are blind due to not having knowledge.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rig pa rtogs shing sdom par gyur to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rig pa rtogs shing sdom par gyur to //
translated: All the Ones-Gone-Thus have knowledge and have realized the vows.

original: zhes smras la rig pa ci dga' bar @303a *//
analyzed: zhes smras la rig pa ci dga' bar @303a *//
translated: Thus, having spoken, one should recite the awareness as one likes and accomplish it.

original: bzlas shing bsgrub par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so //
analyzed: bzlas shing bsgrub par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so //
translated: Thus has the Blessed One, the Noble Vajra Holder, taught.

original: de nas snying po dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya dang rig pa thams cad ji ltar bsgom pa nyid du rdo rje bzlas pa'i chog rgyas pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de nas snying po dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya dang rig pa thams cad ji ltar bsgom pa nyid du rdo rje bzlas pa'i chog rgyas pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: Now, the extensive ritual of vajra repetition is just the meditation on all the essences, mantras, seals, and awarenesses.

original: sems dpa' gang gi snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / rig pa rnams bzlas pa'i don du bsgrub par bya ba de ni bdag gam sems dpa' bsgoms na bsgrub par bya ba 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems dpa' gang gi snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / rig pa rnams bzlas pa'i don du bsgrub par bya ba de ni bdag gam sems dpa' bsgoms na bsgrub par bya ba 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one meditates on oneself or on the sattva, the essence, seal, secret mantra, and awarenesses of any sattva, one will accomplish the object of repetition.

original: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //🔽rigs thams cad kyi thun mong du bzlas pa'i chog rgyas pa rdzogs so //
analyzed: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so // rigs thams cad kyi thun mong du bzlas pa'i chog rgyas pa rdzogs so //
translated: Thus has the Blessed One, Vajrasattva, taught.🔽The extensive ritual of repetition common to all the families is complete.

original: de nas rigs thams cad kyi thun mong du bsgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de nas rigs thams cad kyi thun mong du bsgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di lta ste /
translated: Now, the extensive ritual of accomplishment common to all the families is as follows.

original: de la dang po kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rigs kyi dngos grub ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de la dang po kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rigs kyi dngos grub ni 'di lta ste /
translated: “First of all, the siddhi of the family of the Tathāgatas is as follows:

original: nor 'grub pa'i dngos grub dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub dang / rig 'dzin nyid du 'grub pa dang; dngos grub chen po rnams so //
analyzed: nor 'grub pa'i dngos grub dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub dang / rig 'dzin nyid du 'grub pa dang; dngos grub chen po rnams so //
translated: the siddhi of wealth, the siddhi of magical power, the siddhi of becoming a knowledge-holder, and the siddhis of the great.

original: de la nor 'grub pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de la nor 'grub pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: “The siddhi of wealth is as follows:

original: gang na gter yod par dvogs pa der phyag rgya bcings la rang gi ting nge 'dzin gyis gter gyi gnas der rdo rje blta bas lta ba na /
analyzed: gang na gter yod par dvogs pa der phyag rgya bcings la rang gi ting nge 'dzin gyis gter gyi gnas der rdo rje blta bas lta ba na /
translated: Where there is a doubt about a treasure, one should form the seal there, and with one’s samādhi, one should look at the site of the treasure with the vajra gaze.

original: ci ste rdo rje lta bu yang bar mthong na don gter yod par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: ci ste rdo rje lta bu yang bar mthong na don gter yod par shes par bya'o //
translated: If one sees the vajra as light, one should know that the treasure is there.

original: de nas rdo rje lcags sgrog gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te sa brkos @303b la ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du blangs na rtsod pa med par thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje lcags sgrog gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te sa brkos @303b la ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du blangs na rtsod pa med par thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, having formed the pledge seal of the vajra fetters, one should dig the ground and take it as one wishes. One will obtain it without dispute.

original: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
translated: Thus has declared the Blessed One, Vajrasattva.

original: de la 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub 'grub ba yin te /
analyzed: de la 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub 'grub ba yin te /
translated: This is the accomplishment of the feat of magical powers.

original: phyag rgya gang sgrub par byed na badzra siddhi zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya gang sgrub par byed na badzra siddhi zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: Whatever seal one accomplishes, one should say vajra siddhi.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub ni rnam pa bzhi yod de /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub ni rnam pa bzhi yod de /
translated: There are four kinds of feats of magical powers.

original: de ni 'di ltar chu'i steng nas phar 'gro zhing 'dug pa la sogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa thams cad kyi gzugs ston pa dang / ji srid du dga' ba de srid du mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang dpag tshad stong gi steng du lding ba dang /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar chu'i steng nas phar 'gro zhing 'dug pa la sogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa thams cad kyi gzugs ston pa dang / ji srid du dga' ba de srid du mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang dpag tshad stong gi steng du lding ba dang /
translated: They are as follows: walking on water without sinking, and so on; displaying the forms of all the Tathagatas and so on; becoming invisible for as long as one wishes; and flying in the sky, rising up into the sky to the height of one fathom, and so on.

original: 'og tu 'gro zhing 'ong ba dang / phyogs thams cad du dpag tshad stong du ci dga' bar song la bskor te slar 'ong pa dang / dpag tshad stong khor ra khor yug gi sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa shes pa dang / dngos po thams cad mig gis mthong zhing rna bas thos pa dang /
analyzed: 'og tu 'gro zhing 'ong ba dang / phyogs thams cad du dpag tshad stong du ci dga' bar song la bskor te slar 'ong pa dang / dpag tshad stong khor ra khor yug gi sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa shes pa dang / dngos po thams cad mig gis mthong zhing rna bas thos pa dang /
translated: He can know the thoughts of all the beings in a thousand leagues all around. He can see with his eyes and hear with his ears all the things in a thousand leagues all around.🔽He can take any woman in a thousand leagues all around as he wishes, and he can steal all the gold, jewels, pearls, and so forth, and all the wealth of everyone.

original: phyogs thams cad du dpag tshad stong khor yug na gnas pa'i bud med thams cad ci dga' bar 'phang du blangs te 'dug pa dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig la sogs ba'i dbyig thams cad dang / nor thams cad phrogs nas kyang sus kyang chung zad kyang brgal mi nus te /
analyzed: phyogs thams cad du dpag tshad stong khor yug na gnas pa'i bud med thams cad ci dga' bar 'phang du blangs te 'dug pa dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig la sogs ba'i dbyig thams cad dang / nor thams cad phrogs nas kyang sus kyang chung zad kyang brgal mi nus te /
translated: No one can challenge him in the least,

original: bdag gi rdo rjes kyang mi thub par 'gyur na gzhan gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos /
analyzed: bdag gi rdo rjes kyang mi thub par 'gyur na gzhan gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos /
translated: and even my vajra cannot overcome him, let alone anyone else.

original: skyes bu stong phrag @304a *//
analyzed: skyes bu stong phrag @304a *//
translated: “A thousand men

original: bcu bsdoms pa'i stobs dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu nad med pa dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu 'dod pa thams cad la longs spyod pa dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu dar la bab cing lha'i gzugs dang ldan pa dang / rdo rje sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhing rdo rje'i dngos grub bla na med pas mchod pa byed cing lo stong phrag bcu bzhi'i bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bcu bsdoms pa'i stobs dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu nad med pa dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu 'dod pa thams cad la longs spyod pa dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu dar la bab cing lha'i gzugs dang ldan pa dang / rdo rje sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhing rdo rje'i dngos grub bla na med pas mchod pa byed cing lo stong phrag bcu bzhi'i bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
translated: He will have the strength of ten thousand men, will always be free from illness, will always enjoy all pleasures, will always be youthful and have the body of a god, will see all the tathagatas together with Vajrasattva, and will make offerings to them with the unsurpassed vajra siddhi, and will live for fourteen thousand years.

original: zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dngos grub kyis gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dngos grub kyis gsungs so //
translated: Thus has spoken the Blessed One, the vajra siddhi of all tathagatas.

original: de la 'di ni rdo rje rig 'dzin gyi dngos grub 'grub pa yin te /
analyzed: de la 'di ni rdo rje rig 'dzin gyi dngos grub 'grub pa yin te /
translated: Here is the accomplishment of the vajra knowledge holder's siddhi:🔽When accomplishing the mudra, one should say vajra knowledge holder and it will be accomplished.

original: phyag rgya bsgrub pa na rdo rje rig 'dzin ces brjod la 'grub pa dang / rdo rje rig 'dzin gyis 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: phyag rgya bsgrub pa na rdo rje rig 'dzin ces brjod la 'grub pa dang / rdo rje rig 'dzin gyis 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur te /
translated: The vajra knowledge holder becomes a chakravartin.

original: 'dod pa thams cad la longs spyod pa dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du skad cig gis bskor te /
analyzed: 'dod pa thams cad la longs spyod pa dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du skad cig gis bskor te /
translated: He will enjoy all desires, and will circle all buddhafields in an instant.

original: slar 'ong zhing bde ba thams cad la yongs su spyad pa dang / lo bco brgyad pa'i na tshod dang ldan pa dang / skra 'khyil ba dang ldan pa dang / rdo rje chen po'i rig 'dzin du gyur nas /
analyzed: slar 'ong zhing bde ba thams cad la yongs su spyad pa dang / lo bco brgyad pa'i na tshod dang ldan pa dang / skra 'khyil ba dang ldan pa dang / rdo rje chen po'i rig 'dzin du gyur nas /
translated: He will return and enjoy all pleasures, and will have the body of an eighteen-year-old, with curly hair, and will become a master of the knowledge of the great vajra.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rdo rje sems dpa' thams cad mthong zhing bskal ba chen po'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rdo rje sems dpa' thams cad mthong zhing bskal ba chen po'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will see all the tathāgatas and all the Vajrasattvas, and will live for one great eon.

original: zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig 'dzin gyis gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig 'dzin gyis gsungs so //
translated: Thus has spoken the Blessed One, the Knowledge-Being of all the Tathāgatas.

original: de la 'di ni @304b dngos grub chen po 'grub pa yin te /
analyzed: de la 'di ni @304b dngos grub chen po 'grub pa yin te /
translated: Here is the accomplishment of the great powers:

original: bdag nyid phyag rgya'i snying po don du bdag nyid kyis phyag rgya bsgrubs na sems dpa'i gzugs su gyur nas skad cig gcig gis kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gzugs sna tshogs kyis bya ba sna tshogs bye dpa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems dpar bcas pa thams cad mthong nas rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pas yang dag par mchod nas sems can ma lus zhing lus pa med pa rnams kyi don byas nas slar 'ongs te /
analyzed: bdag nyid phyag rgya'i snying po don du bdag nyid kyis phyag rgya bsgrubs na sems dpa'i gzugs su gyur nas skad cig gcig gis kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gzugs sna tshogs kyis bya ba sna tshogs bye dpa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems dpar bcas pa thams cad mthong nas rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pas yang dag par mchod nas sems can ma lus zhing lus pa med pa rnams kyi don byas nas slar 'ongs te /
translated: Having seen all the tathagatas and all the vajrasattvas, one makes perfect offerings to the tathagatas endowed with all supreme aspects, one performs the welfare of all sentient beings without exception, and one returns.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyis rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'dod pa thams cad dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad la spyod cing rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por gyur nas tshe'i tshad ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i bskal pa chen po'i tshad du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyis rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'dod pa thams cad dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad la spyod cing rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por gyur nas tshe'i tshad ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i bskal pa chen po'i tshad du 'gyur ro //
translated: One will enjoy all the pleasures, happiness, and delight of all the worlds, endowed with all the most excellent forms, and having become a bodhisattva-mahāsattva equal to Vajrasattva, one’s lifespan will be equal to the measure of a great eon, without remainder or exception.

original: zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs kyi dngos grub chen pos gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs kyi dngos grub chen pos gsungs so //
translated: Thus has spoken the Blessed One, the Tathāgata, of the great siddhi of means.

original: de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos grub ste /
analyzed: de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos grub ste /
translated: Now, this is the siddhi of the Vajra family:

original: de yang 'di ltar khams gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dngos grub dang / dbang thams cad kyi dngos grub dang / bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub dang / dngos grub dam pa rnams so //
analyzed: de yang 'di ltar khams gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dngos grub dang / dbang thams cad kyi dngos grub dang / bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub dang / dngos grub dam pa rnams so //
translated: namely, the siddhi of victory over the three realms, the siddhi of all powers, the siddhi of all happiness and delight, and the supreme siddhis.

original: de la 'di ni @305a *//
analyzed: de la 'di ni @305a *//
translated: Now, this is the siddhi of the Lotus family:

original: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dngos grub yin te /
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dngos grub yin te /
translated: This is the power of total victory over the three worlds.

original: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bcings la dbang phyug chen po rkang pa g-yon pas mnan te bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bcings la dbang phyug chen po rkang pa g-yon pas mnan te bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: Binding the mudra of total victory over the three realms, trampling on Mahesvara with the left foot, one should practice.

original: de nas gzugs de skad 'byin pa dang / h'um zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas gzugs de skad 'byin pa dang / h'um zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o //
translated: Then, when that form utters the sound “ha,” one should utter “hum.”

original: h'um zhes brjod pa tsam gyis dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams sgrub pa'i mdun du bka' nyan cing dbang du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: h'um zhes brjod pa tsam gyis dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams sgrub pa'i mdun du bka' nyan cing dbang du 'gyur ro //
translated: By merely uttering “hum,” Mahesvara and so forth, the lords of the entire triple world together with their retinues, will appear before the practitioner, obedient and subjugated.

original: de phyin chad 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de phyin chad 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur te /
translated: From then on, one will become the lord of the entire triple world, a vajra holder.

original: nam mkha' la 'gro zhing 'jig rten gsum po 'khor lo thams cad kun tu bskor te /
analyzed: nam mkha' la 'gro zhing 'jig rten gsum po 'khor lo thams cad kun tu bskor te /
translated: Flying through the sky, one will turn the wheel of the entire triple world.

original: slar 'ongs nas lha ma rungs pa la sogs pa sems can thams cad h'um zhes bya bas 'dul bar byed do //
analyzed: slar 'ongs nas lha ma rungs pa la sogs pa sems can thams cad h'um zhes bya bas 'dul bar byed do //
translated: Returning, one will tame all unruly gods and so forth, all sentient beings, with “hum.”

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje h'um zhes bya ba'i gzugs dang ldan pas 'jig rten gsum po thams cad la bka' stsol cing rdo rje sems dpar bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong nas mnyes par byed cing lo stong du 'tsho bar byed
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje h'um zhes bya ba'i gzugs dang ldan pas 'jig rten gsum po thams cad la bka' stsol cing rdo rje sems dpar bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong nas mnyes par byed cing lo stong du 'tsho bar byed
translated: By the form of the Tathagata Vajra Humkara, he commands the three worlds, and by seeing all Tathagatas, including Vajrasattva, he pleases them and lives for a thousand years.

original: par 'gyur ro; ;bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um zhes byed pas gsungs so //
analyzed: par 'gyur ro; ;bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um zhes byed pas gsungs so //
translated: This has been taught by the Blessed One, Vajra Humkara.

original: de la 'di ni dbang thams cad kyi dngos grub ste /
analyzed: de la 'di ni dbang thams cad kyi dngos grub ste /
translated: “Now, the siddhi of all powers is as follows:

original: phyag rgya bsgrub ba na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad @305b kyi dbang bskur ba'i rin po che'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas dang por bdag nyid dbang bskur la bsgrub par bya ste /
analyzed: phyag rgya bsgrub ba na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad @305b kyi dbang bskur ba'i rin po che'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas dang por bdag nyid dbang bskur la bsgrub par bya ste /
translated: When accomplishing the seal, first empower yourself with the jewel samaya seal of empowerment of all Tathagatas.

original: de nas grub pa dang / dbang rnam pa bzhir 'gyur te /
analyzed: de nas grub pa dang / dbang rnam pa bzhir 'gyur te /
translated: Then, there will be four kinds of powers:

original: rdo rje'i dbang dang / rin po che'i dbang dang / chos kyi dbang dang / las kyi dbang rnams so //
analyzed: rdo rje'i dbang dang / rin po che'i dbang dang / chos kyi dbang dang / las kyi dbang rnams so //
translated: the vajra empowerment, the jewel empowerment, the dharma empowerment, and the action empowerment.

original: de la rdo rje'i dbang thob na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la rdo rje'i dbang thob na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one obtains the vajra empowerment, one becomes a vajra holder of all the tathāgatas.

original: rin po che'i dbang thob na rin po che thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rin po che'i dbang thob na rin po che thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro //
translated: If one obtains the jewel empowerment, one becomes the lord of all jewels.

original: chos kyi dbang gis ni chos thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos kyi dbang gis ni chos thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro //
translated: By the Dharma empowerment, one becomes the king of all Dharma.

original: las kyi dbang gis ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las thams cad kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: las kyi dbang gis ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las thams cad kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: By the action empowerment, one obtains the spiritual power of all supramundane actions.

original: zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gis gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gis gsungs so //
translated: Thus has the Blessed One, empowered by all the tathāgatas, declared.

original: de la 'di ni bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub ste /
analyzed: de la 'di ni bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub ste /
translated: Here is the spiritual power of all bliss and mental happiness:

original: de yang 'di ltar rtag tu gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byas na /
analyzed: de yang 'di ltar rtag tu gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byas na /
translated: If one always makes offerings to all the tathāgatas with the secret offerings,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad kyis gsungs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad kyis gsungs so //
translated: Thus declared the Blessed One, the bliss and mental joy of all the Tathagatas.

original: de la 'di ni dngos grub dam pa ste /
analyzed: de la 'di ni dngos grub dam pa ste /
translated: The highest power is this:

original: de yang ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bdag mnyam mo zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin apas gsungs so //
analyzed: de yang ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bdag mnyam mo zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin apas gsungs so //
translated: I am equal to Vajrapani. Thus declared the Blessed One, Vajrapani.

original: de la 'di dag ni padma'i rigs kyi @306a *//🔽dngos grub rnams te /
analyzed: de la 'di dag ni padma'i rigs kyi @306a *// dngos grub rnams te /
translated: The powers of the lotus family are as follows:

original: de ni 'di ltar mnyes par bya ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / bsrung ba dang / padma'i dngos grub rnams so //
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar mnyes par bya ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / bsrung ba dang / padma'i dngos grub rnams so //
translated: They are the power of pleasing, the power of controlling, the power of protecting, and the power of the lotus.

original: de la mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de la mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub ni 'di yin te /
translated: The power of pleasing is as follows:

original: ji ltar padma 'dod pa bsgoms na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa sems can thams cad mnyes par byed nus par 'gyur ro; ;bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug rjes su dran par byas na sems can thams cad dbang du byed nus par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji ltar padma 'dod pa bsgoms na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa sems can thams cad mnyes par byed nus par 'gyur ro; ;bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug rjes su dran par byas na sems can thams cad dbang du byed nus par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one recollects oneself as Lokeśvara, one will be able to bring all sentient beings under one’s control.

original: byams pas 'gengs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis 'gro pa thams cad bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / bskyab nus par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byams pas 'gengs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis 'gro pa thams cad bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / bskyab nus par 'gyur ro //
translated: Through the samādhi of being filled with love, one will be able to protect, guard, and defend all beings.

original: bdag nyid padma'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs la padma lag par blangs te bsgrubs na 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs dang ldan pa dang / rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan zhing lo stong phrag bzhir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi padmas gsungs so //
analyzed: bdag nyid padma'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs la padma lag par blangs te bsgrubs na 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs dang ldan pa dang / rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan zhing lo stong phrag bzhir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi padmas gsungs so //
translated: If one enters the lotus samādhi, takes a lotus in one’s hand, and practices, one will attain the form of Lokeśvara, endowed with all the supreme aspects, and will live for forty thousand years. This was taught by the Blessed One, the Lotus of All Tathāgatas.

original: de la 'di dag ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dngos grub rnams te /
analyzed: de la 'di dag ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dngos grub rnams te /
translated: Here are the accomplishments of the jewel family:

original: de yang 'di ltar rigs thams cad kyi dbang gi dngos grub dang / gzi brjid chen po dang / bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang rin po che'i dngos grub rnams so //
analyzed: de yang 'di ltar rigs thams cad kyi dbang gi dngos grub dang / gzi brjid chen po dang / bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang rin po che'i dngos grub rnams so //
translated: The great splendor, the fulfillment of all wishes, and the gem accomplishments of all families are as follows:

original: de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gi dngos grub ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gi dngos grub ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The accomplishment of the consecration of all the Tathagatas is as follows:

original: nyid kyis @306b dbang dbul ba dang / mar me dbul ba dang / ci nus kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / rin po che bsgrub pa'i dngos grub 'di dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod na ring po mi thogs par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyid kyis @306b dbang dbul ba dang / mar me dbul ba dang / ci nus kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / rin po che bsgrub pa'i dngos grub 'di dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod na ring po mi thogs par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: By offering oneself, by offering lamps, by fulfilling the perfection of generosity as much as possible, and by the accomplishment of the gem, if one worships all the Tathagatas with these, one will quickly be successful.

original: zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po ches gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po ches gsungs so //
translated: Thus spoke the Blessed One, the Gem of all the Tathagatas.

original: rigs thams cad kyi thun mong pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so ////
analyzed: rigs thams cad kyi thun mong pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so ////
translated: The extensive ritual of the common accomplishments of all families is complete.

original: de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi thabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi thabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o //
translated: Then I will explain the tantra of the means of achieving the powers of all the concepts.

original: zhes bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang / tha ma med pa'i sems dpas gsungs so //

original: mi rtog gang la rtog bdag de; cho ga bzhin du ri mor bris //
analyzed: mi rtog gang la rtog bdag de; cho ga bzhin du ri mor bris //

original: rtog pa grub sbyin zhes brtags pa //
analyzed: rtog pa grub sbyin zhes brtags pa //

original: rtog las bral ba'i bdag nyid kyis //
analyzed: rtog las bral ba'i bdag nyid kyis //
translated: is the one who is free from conceptualization.

original: de phyir rtog pa zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de phyir rtog pa zhes gsungs so //

original: de la 'di ni padma'i rigs kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de /
analyzed: de la 'di ni padma'i rigs kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de /

analyzed: rtog pa las ni 'dod chags 'byung //

analyzed: padma la ni de gnas te //

original: de phyir rtog la gnas pa ni //
analyzed: de phyir rtog la gnas pa ni //
translated: Therefore, the one who abides in concepts

original: grub pa nyid du de 'gyur ro //
analyzed: grub pa nyid du de 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de la 'di @309b ni nor bu'i rigs kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de /
translated: This is the Jewel family’s Tantra of the Knowledge of the Arising of Concepts.

original: rtog pa med pa'i nor bu ni //
analyzed: rtog pa med pa'i nor bu ni //
translated: The nonconceptual jewel

original: mthu yis shin tu mchog tu 'gyur //
analyzed: mthu yis shin tu mchog tu 'gyur //

original: de ltar rnam par mi rtog pas //
analyzed: de ltar rnam par mi rtog pas //

original: lha rdzas dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: lha rdzas dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur //

original: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //

original: rigs thams cad kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i rgyud do //
analyzed: rigs thams cad kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i rgyud do //

analyzed: de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi snying po 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de /

analyzed: yid kyis 'dod pa'i chog yis //

original: yid kyis 'dod pa grub 'gyur te //
analyzed: yid kyis 'dod pa grub 'gyur te //
translated: The mind's desires are accomplished.

original: ting 'dzin sgrub pa snying la gnas //
analyzed: ting 'dzin sgrub pa snying la gnas //

original: de phyir snying po zhes brjod do //
analyzed: de phyir snying po zhes brjod do //

analyzed: de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de /

analyzed: ji ltar rgyal po'i phyag rgya mchog /

original: khrims ni 'da' ka mi phyed bzhin //
analyzed: khrims ni 'da' ka mi phyed bzhin //

original: bdag nyid chen po gzugs brnyan gyis //
analyzed: bdag nyid chen po gzugs brnyan gyis //

original: mtshan ma phyag rgya zhes par grags //
analyzed: mtshan ma phyag rgya zhes par grags //

original: de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi spags 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de /
analyzed: de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi spags 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de /
translated: Then, the Tantra of the Gnosis of the Arising of the Mantras of All Concepts:

original: 'da' bar bya ba ma yin zhing //
analyzed: 'da' bar bya ba ma yin zhing //

original: dbye ba dka' las gsang ba nyid //
analyzed: dbye ba dka' las gsang ba nyid //

original: gsang ba grub phyir brjod pas na //
analyzed: gsang ba grub phyir brjod pas na //

analyzed: de yi phyir na sngags zhes brjod //

original: de nas rig pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de /
analyzed: de nas rig pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de /
translated: Then, the Tantra of the Gnosis that Arises from Awareness.🔽In order to conquer ignorance🔽and to accomplish the supreme awareness of the elements,

analyzed: ma rig pa ni gzhom pa dang // dag gi rig mchog 'grub pa'i phyir; ;rtogs shing rig pa'i dngos grub ste //

original: de phyir rtog pa zhes brjod do //
analyzed: de phyir rtog pa zhes brjod do //

analyzed: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so // rtog pa thams cad kyi snying po la sogs @310a *//

analyzed: pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud do //

original: de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi ye shes 'byung ba'i rgyud de /
analyzed: de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi ye shes 'byung ba'i rgyud de /

original: de la dang po /
analyzed: de la dang po /

analyzed: kho nar snying po'i ye shes skye ba'i rgyud yin te snying po bzlas te bdag gam ni //
translated: it is the Tantra of the Arising of the Gnosis of the Essence, which is the essence mantra.🔽Reciting it,

original: gzhan yang rung ste byung ba na //🔽byung dang 'byung 'gyur gang gis ni //
analyzed: gzhan yang rung ste byung ba na // byung dang 'byung 'gyur gang gis ni //
translated: whether for oneself or another,🔽one should know what has arisen and what will arise,

original: mthong zhing thos 'gyur shes par bya //
analyzed: mthong zhing thos 'gyur shes par bya //
translated: what has been seen and heard.

original: de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i ye shes 'byung ba'i rgyud yin te /
analyzed: de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i ye shes 'byung ba'i rgyud yin te /
translated: Among them, this is the Tantra of the Arising of the Gnosis of the Seal:

original: bdag gis cho ga ji bzhin du //
analyzed: bdag gis cho ga ji bzhin du //
translated: Just as prescribed,

original: gang yang rung ba'i phyag rgya bcings //
analyzed: gang yang rung ba'i phyag rgya bcings //

original: 'jig rten pa la bltas na ni //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa la bltas na ni //
translated: If one looks at the worldly ones,

original: gong ma bzhin du kun shes 'gyur //
analyzed: gong ma bzhin du kun shes 'gyur //

original: de la 'di ni sngags kyi ye shes 'byung ba'i rgyud yin te /
analyzed: de la 'di ni sngags kyi ye shes 'byung ba'i rgyud yin te /
translated: “Now, this is the tantra of the arising of the knowledge of the mantras:

original: lan gcig tsam yang sngags brjod na //
analyzed: lan gcig tsam yang sngags brjod na //
translated: Even if one recites the mantra just once,

original: 'das dang 'byung dang byung gang yin //🔽rang gi lce la smra 'gyur ba //
analyzed: 'das dang 'byung dang byung gang yin // rang gi lce la smra 'gyur ba //
translated: Whatever has passed, is passing, or will pass,

original: de dag thams cad bde par 'gyur //
analyzed: de dag thams cad bde par 'gyur //

original: zhes bcom ldan 'das kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bcom ldan 'das kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so //

original: de la 'di ni rig pa'i ye shes skye ba'i rgyud de /
analyzed: de la 'di ni rig pa'i ye shes skye ba'i rgyud de /

original: rig pa lan gcig brjod na ni //
analyzed: rig pa lan gcig brjod na ni //
translated: Even if one recites the vidyā just once,

original: byung dang 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur rnams //🔽ji ltar rdo rje'i bka' bzhin du //
analyzed: byung dang 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur rnams // ji ltar rdo rje'i bka' bzhin du //
translated: Whatever has happened, is happening, or will happen,🔽One will know it mentally,

original: yid kyis de ni shes par 'gyur //
analyzed: yid kyis de ni shes par 'gyur //

analyzed: rtog pa thams cad kyi ye shes skye ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud rdzogs so ////
translated: The Tantra of the Extensive Rituals for the Arising of the Knowledge of All Mandalas is complete.

original: de nas rigs thams cad kyi thun mong gi gsad pa'i sku dang / thugs rdo rje'i phyag @310b rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud yin no //
analyzed: de nas rigs thams cad kyi thun mong gi gsad pa'i sku dang / thugs rdo rje'i phyag @310b rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud yin no //
translated: Then, it is the tantra for accomplishing the body seal of the common killing of all the families, and the mind vajra seal.

analyzed: de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi sku'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa yin te /

original: ji ltar de ltar 'dug nas kyang //
analyzed: ji ltar de ltar 'dug nas kyang //

original: skyil mo krung bcas bsgrub bya ste //
analyzed: skyil mo krung bcas bsgrub bya ste //

original: ji ltar ri mo'i tshul byas nas //
analyzed: ji ltar ri mo'i tshul byas nas //
translated: and having made the image,

original: sems dpa' chen po grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: sems dpa' chen po grub par 'gyur //
translated: the great being will be accomplished.

original: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems da pas gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems da pas gsungs so //
translated: Thus declared the Blessed Vajrasattva.

analyzed: de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sku'i phyag rgya sgrub pa yin te /
translated: Here is the accomplishment of the secret body seal of the Vajra family:

analyzed: ji ltar ri mo'i tshul du ni //
translated: Having made the image,

original: brkang bskum tshul du gnas byas te //
analyzed: brkang bskum tshul du gnas byas te //
translated: one should stand in the posture with the foot drawn up,

original: shin tu khros nas sgrub byas na //
analyzed: shin tu khros nas sgrub byas na //
translated: and having accomplished it with great wrath,

original: the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: there will be accomplishment without doubt.

original: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um zhes bya bas gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um zhes bya bas gsungs so //
translated: Thus declared the Blessed Vajra Humkara.

analyzed: de la 'di ni padma'i rigs kyi gsad pa'i sku'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud yin te / rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas la //

analyzed: lag gnyis rdo rje bcings nas kyang //

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi skur gyur la //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi skur gyur la //
translated: one should become the samadhi body

original: padma 'byung ba bsgrub par bya //
analyzed: padma 'byung ba bsgrub par bya //

original: zhes bcom ldan 'das padma'i sems dpas gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bcom ldan 'das padma'i sems dpas gsungs so //

analyzed: de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sku'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa yin te /
translated: This is the accomplishment of the secret seal of the body of the Jewel Family:

original: ji ltar 'dug gam nyal ba'am //
analyzed: ji ltar 'dug gam nyal ba'am //
translated: Whether standing, lying down,

analyzed: 'chag kyang rung ste de ltar ni //

original: rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur na //
analyzed: rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur na //
translated: one should consecrate the vajra jewel;

original: the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: there is no doubt of accomplishment.

original: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so //
translated: Thus declares the Blessed Vajra-garbha.

analyzed: de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i gsungs gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de / lce rtse shin tu @311a *//

original: mi bsgul zhing //
analyzed: mi bsgul zhing //

original: so dang mchu gnyis sbyar nas ni //
analyzed: so dang mchu gnyis sbyar nas ni //

original: rtog pa thams cad bsgrub bya zhing //
analyzed: rtog pa thams cad bsgrub bya zhing //

analyzed: sgra bral rdo rje'i tshig yin no // zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsung gis gsungs so //

analyzed: de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i gsung gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de //

original: h'um zhes bya ba 'brug sgrar bsgrags //
analyzed: h'um zhes bya ba 'brug sgrar bsgrags //

original: khro bo'i ngag ni zab cing bstan /
analyzed: khro bo'i ngag ni zab cing bstan /

original: rdo rje chen po khro bo'i gsal //
analyzed: rdo rje chen po khro bo'i gsal //

original: rdo rje khro bo'i gsung 'grub bo //
analyzed: rdo rje khro bo'i gsung 'grub bo //
translated: The speech of the vajra wrath is accomplished.

original: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um zhes bya bas gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um zhes bya bas gsungs so //
translated: Thus have I heard.

original: de la 'di ni padma'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i gsung gi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud de /
analyzed: de la 'di ni padma'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i gsung gi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud de /
translated: The secret vajra speech of the lotus family is accomplished by this tantra:

original: dbugs mi 'byin ltar dbugs 'byin cing //
analyzed: dbugs mi 'byin ltar dbugs 'byin cing //
translated: Exhaling like not exhaling,

original: phra ba'i tshig ni shin tu gsal //
analyzed: phra ba'i tshig ni shin tu gsal //
translated: The subtle words are very clear.

original: ting 'dzin ye shes snying po yis //
analyzed: ting 'dzin ye shes snying po yis //
translated: The essence of the wisdom of samādhi

original: zlos pa po rnams grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: zlos pa po rnams grub par 'gyur //
translated: Will accomplish the reciters.

original: zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi snying pos gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi snying pos gsungs so //
translated: Thus did the Blessed One, the essence of the wisdom of the meditative absorption of all the tathāgatas, declare.

original: de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i gsung gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de /
analyzed: de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i gsung gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de /
translated: “Now, the secret speech-seal practice of the jewel family is as follows:

original: shin tu yongs su gsal tshig gis //
analyzed: shin tu yongs su gsal tshig gis //
translated: “With very clear words,

analyzed: rtag tu 'dud la brtson byed cing //
translated: always striving to bow down,

original: tshul 'di bzlas par gyur na ni //
analyzed: tshul 'di bzlas par gyur na ni //
translated: if one recites this method,

original: myur du thams cad 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: myur du thams cad 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: all will be quickly accomplished.

original: zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rjes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rjes gsungs so //
translated: Thus did the Blessed One, the vajra of all the tathāgatas, declare.

original: de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs @311b kyi gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud de /
analyzed: de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs @311b kyi gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud de /
translated: “Now, the secret mind-seal practice of the tathāgata family is as follows:

original: rtag tu 'dod pa bcom ldan 'das //
analyzed: rtag tu 'dod pa bcom ldan 'das //

original: sems can thams cad bde sbyin pas //
analyzed: sems can thams cad bde sbyin pas //
translated: bestowing happiness on all beings,

original: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid du //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid du //
translated: meditating on oneself as Vajrasattva,

original: bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: one will quickly be successful.

original: zhes bcom ldan 'das 'dod pas gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bcom ldan 'das 'dod pas gsungs so //

original: de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de //
analyzed: de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de //
translated: This is the Tantra of the Attainment of the Secret Mind Seal of the Vajra Family.🔽For the sake of benefiting all sentient beings,

analyzed: sems can kun la phan pa dang // ma rungs pa rnams gdul ba dang // sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir //

original: khro bo dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: khro bo dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur //
translated: one will attain the spiritual powers of wrath.

analyzed: zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje h'um zhes bya bas gsungs so //
translated: Thus spoke the Blessed One, the Vajra Hūṃ of all Tathāgatas.

original: de la 'di ni padma'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de /
analyzed: de la 'di ni padma'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de /
translated: This is the Tantra of the Attainment of the Secret Mind Seal of the Lotus Family.

original: ji ltar padma rab chags la //
analyzed: ji ltar padma rab chags la //
translated: Just as a lotus is not stained

original: bgos pa'i skyon gyis mi gos pa //
analyzed: bgos pa'i skyon gyis mi gos pa //
translated: by the faults of attachment,

original: de ltar bdag gis chags skyon yang //
analyzed: de ltar bdag gis chags skyon yang //
translated: so too, I, with the faults of attachment,

original: srid na chags pa de 'grub 'gyur //
analyzed: srid na chags pa de 'grub 'gyur //
translated: will accomplish that attachment in existence.

original: zhes bcom ldan 'das padma bzhad pas gsungs so //
